sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import { ImageWrapper, SectionDesc, SectionLayout, SectionTitle } from '../../SectionsComponents' export const ServicePriceMiscalculations = ({ priceDesc, stages, isPrice = true }) => { return ( }> {isPrice && ( )} {stages && stages.map(({ title, desc }, index) => ( {index + 1} {title}} className="stage-title" isContentWhite /> ))} ) }
